name: SODIUM CHLORIDE

contraindications.text: directed physician . cautions : warm oven 50°c maximum 60 days . discard 60 days warming . unless solution clear seal intact . discard unused portion . rx .

warningsAndPrecautions: recommended storage : room temperature ( 25°c ) . avoid excessive heat .
indications_original: Isotonic solution for irrigation only.  Not for injection.
contraindications_original:
As directed by a physician.
                  Cautions: Warm in oven to not more than 50°C for a maximum of 60 days. Discard after 60 days of warming. Do not use unless solution is clear and seal is intact. Discard unused portion.  Rx only.
warningsAndPrecautions_original: Recommended storage: Room temperature (25°C). Avoid excessive heat.
